name: Baktesh Kamath
review: Good restaurant serving authentic Indian food especially North Indian cuisine. Bit spicy even for a normal Indian origin person so tell them in advance for medium spicy. Quantity or portion size are very good two people can easily share. Quality & taste is very good.  Rehriwale Dahi bhalle was a bit disappointing. Overall Good value for money. Their dal makhani and naan are highly recommended.

name: Janithza Lopez
review:
4 stars because Karan was simply amazing.

We ordered take-out; two chicken entrées, and I really, really wanted to like it, but, it was too oily and had 3 small pieces of chicken, nan bread was small and too thin. And since we stayed at a hotel, our food was not placed into two plates, instead the rice was all in one container and had no utensils. The flavor however is good.

Karan has amazing customer skills. I'll be going back to give it a second chance next time I visit Tempe.
